Climate Alliance bụ netwọk Europe nké mpaghara ọbọdọ, obodo na mpaghara ndị e guzobere n'afọ 1990 na-etinye aka na ichebe ihu igwe ụwa
European Secretariat of Climate Alliance dị na Frankfurt am Main, Germany na Brussels, Belgium

Climate Alliance nwèrè ndị otu na Austria, Belarus, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland,d, France, Georgia, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, North Macedonia, Netherlands, Peru, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland na Ukraine.
Ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ndị otu puku abuo sitere na mba irí abụọ na ise dị na Europe na-ezube ibelata gas na-ekpo ọkụ na isi iyi ha
Ndị ha na ha jikọrọ aka bụ ụmụ amaala nke oké ọhịa
COICA, Coordination of Indigenous Organisations nke mba itoolu gbara agbata obi nke Amazon Basin, na-anọchite anya ndị mmekọ ụmụ amaala.
Site na isonye na Climate Alliance, mpaghara ọbọdọ na ọbọdọ na-anabata ebumnuche nke njikọ ahụ:
Ogidi ntọala nke nchedo ihu igwe dị n'ógbè ahụ bụ nchekwa ike na ojiji ike dị mma yana isi mbido ike na-agbanwe agbanwe na njem gbụrụ-gbúrụ ébé obibi
Climate Alliance na-adụ mpaghara ọbọdọ na obodo ọdụ màkà mmejuputa usoro nchedo ihu igwe ma mepụta ngwaọrụ ndị a ma ama màkà ndekọ nke ike na ikuku CO2
Ọzọkwa, Climate Alliance na-emepe ma na-ahazi ọrụ na mkpọsa, nke na-ekwu màkà ìgwè dị iche iche
E wezụga ọrụ nke ya, Climate Alliance bụ onye mmekọ nke mkpọsa ndị ọzọ na nzọụkwụ na omume ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Na mba na mba ụwa, ọ na-eguzogide ndị ọchịchị mpaghara Europe na-etinye aka na nchedo ihu igwe ma na-akwado òtù ndị obodo.
